title: Generative AI Prompt Engineering
tagline: Expert prompt engineering for Midjourney, ComfyUI, Gemini, and Firefly
description: A comprehensive plugin providing expert agents for generative AI prompting across 4 major platforms. Features 50+ comic art styles, cross-platform conversion, production-ready workflows, and instant prompt generation for any art style and description.

screenshots.title: Platform Expert Agents
screenshots.description: Specialized agents for each platform with deep knowledge of platform-specific syntax and capabilities

screenshots.title: 50+ Comic Art Styles
screenshots.description: Comprehensive style library covering Manga, Western Comics, European Comics, and more

screenshots.title: Cross-Platform Conversion
screenshots.description: Convert prompts between all 4 platforms with automatic syntax transformation

screenshots.title: Production-Ready Output
screenshots.description: Generate complete, ready-to-use prompts with all parameters and recommendations

features: 5 Expert Agents (Midjourney, ComfyUI, Gemini, Firefly, Converter)
